TopicTitle: Help , The elevator works in the factory but does not work in reality

Articles.Content:
I've done everything I know to make the elevator work to get the ground vehicle to Mars, but it doesn't seem to work (the elevator doesn't move), and it says : Cannot toggle Robotics part , Robotics part locked . What should I do to solve these problems? , thanks everyone

Pic about my prolemb

https://ibb.co/b7wv9dg
https://ibb.co/ZK4fzg5
Try and right click the part that is not working, and try and find the lock/unlock button. Do that in the vab and try again. I also had problems getting into KSP robotics.
